fixed_skill.desc: Restore party's HP equal to 19.2/20.2/21.1% of Attack + 581/719/867. Decrease party's damage taken by 8.5/8.9/9.4% for 2 turns.
fixed_skill.name: Mother Goddess' Chant

innate_skill.desc: Restore 1 ally's HP by 35.6/37.4/39.2% of Attack + 1077/1333/1608.
innate_skill.name: Diarama

innate_skill.desc: Restore party's HP by 17.8/18.7/19.6% of Attack + 538/666/804.
innate_skill.name: Mediarama

passive_skill.desc: Increase healing effect by 15%. After healing, heal the ally with the lowest HP for 24% of user's Attack.
passive_skill.name: Echoes of Purity

passive_skill.desc: Increase healing effect by 15%. After healing, heal the ally with the lowest HP for 27% of user's Attack.
passive_skill.name: Echoes of Purity I

passive_skill.desc: Increase healing effect by 15%. After healing, heal the ally with the lowest HP for 27% of user's Attack. If target's HP is below 50%, increase this effect by 15%.
passive_skill.name: Echoes of Purity II

showtime_skill.desc: Restore HP to party equal to 48.6%/52.0%/55.4% Attack + 1471/1854/2275.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
